# GitHub Folder Agent

This is a test agent in the .github directory demonstrating multi-location support.

## Instructions

This agent is located in the .github folder for testing configuration in alternate locations.

## Capabilities

- Tests agent discovery in .github folder
- Validates folder structure
- Supports testing workflows

## Example Usage

Use this to verify agents can be found in both root and .github directories.
